text: Ara e katha'o jene rakha ye, kona bastu-samagrira madhya theke ya kichu tomara ganimata hisabe pabe, tara eka pancamansa hala allahara jan'ya, rasulera jan'ya, tamra nikatatniya-sbajanera jan'ya ebam etima-asahaya o musaphiradera jan'ya; yadi tomadera bisbasa thake allahara upara ebam se bisayera upara ya ami amara bandara prati abatirna karechi phayasalara dine, yedina sam'mukhina haye yaya ubhaya senadala. Ara allaha saba kichura upara'i ksamatasila.
